thanks
but I rewrite a script ,and I can startup the heritrix , create a 
job , start the job ,and it said "Successfully" ,but no anything 
downloaded to my disk ?

why ?
how to config the job to download pages to my disk ? 
thanks


--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "zhousp" <zhousp@6...> wrote:
> hi,if your install heritrix on windows box, you must write your own 
script 
> to start
> heritrix, because bin/heritrix should run on linux.
> 
> if your write your own script to run heritrix, you should add 
heritri.jar as 
> the first one on the classpath.
